content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Configuring approved IP addresses Procedure Go to Administration → Other Settings → Logon Access Control. On the Approved IP Addresses tab, click Add. Specify the IP address and type a description. Only IPv4 addresses are supported. Private IP addresses are not supported. Click Save. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
